title: Slow cooker spicy turkey chilli
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '680g turkey mince', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste', '120ml beer', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 (400g) tins diced tomatoes', '1 tablespoon chopped green chillies', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained', '1 tablespoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '120ml chicken stock']
